name: Create Text File
description: Create a text file with your spoken content. Say 'create text file' followed by the content you want to save. The file will be pasted into the current Finder window.
command:
content=$(echo "$FREEWAY_TEXT" | sed -E 's/^create text file[[:space:]]*//i')
filename="text-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).txt"
filepath="$HOME/Desktop/$filename"
echo "$content" > "$filepath"
osascript -e "set the clipboard to POSIX file \"$filepath\""
sleep 0.1
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using {command down}'
